title: Polkadot's Gain Underperforms Wider Crypto Markets
contentSnippet: The token has support at $2.05 and resistance near the $2.16 level.

title: Perky, With Bearish Overtones: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 8, 2025

title: Prediction markets emerge as speculative ‘arbitrage arena’ for crypto traders
contentSnippet: Predictions markets offer traders more upside than holding the underlying spot crypto, but AI bots and accounts with a 100% win rate raise suspicions of insider trading.

title: Every Major Bitcoin Conference Has Seen Prices Fall in 2025, Will Abu Dhabi Be Different?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin enters the Abu Dhabi conference near $92K after a year of sell-the-news dips at major events, raising questions about another potential pullback.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Reclaims $92K as Fed Rate-Cut Expectations Lift Sentiment
contentSnippet: Bitcoin pushed back above $92,000 during Monday’s Asia session as traders priced in a likely Federal Reserve rate cut this week; altcoins continued to lag.

title: Can panic wallets stop a wrench? Why crypto’s next security debate is physical
contentSnippet: Jameson Lopp’s wrench attack data shows physical assaults on crypto holders surging in 2025, forcing a reckoning over whether self‑custody is worth the physical risk.

title: Crypto funds log second week of inflows after massive $5.5B sell-off
contentSnippet: Bitcoin led the $716 million of inflows to crypto ETPs last week, while Chainlink saw record gains, accounting for more than 50% of its AUM.

title: Bitcoin’s Long-Term Holders Hit Cyclical Low as Sell Pressure Finally Eases
contentSnippet: Long-term holder supply bottomed when bitcoin sank to $80K, signaling that the wave of spot-driven selling may be nearing exhaustion as prices rebound to $90K.

title: BTC Holds Steady as Fed Rate Cut Looms, Rising Treasury Yields Suggest Caution: Analysts
contentSnippet: The Federal Reserve is expected to cut U.S. interest rates by 25 basis points on Wednesday.

title: Did BTC's Santa rally start at $89K? 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
contentSnippet: A Santa rally for Bitcoin and risk assets remained in the cards as the markets prepared for the last Fed interest-rate decision of 2025.

title: US Treasurys lead tokenization wave as CoinShares predicts 2026 growth
contentSnippet: CoinShares said tokenized RWAs jumped 229% in 2025, led by US Treasurys, and it expects dollar-yield demand to keep driving onchain growth into 2026.

title: U.S. Interest Rates, Do Kwon Sentencing: Crypto Week Ahead
contentSnippet: Your look at what's coming in the week starting Dec. 8.

title: Circle and Bybit deepen USDC partnership as stablecoin nears $80B
contentSnippet: Bybit plans deeper USDC adoption for trading and payments, with the stablecoin “already embedded” across its ecosystem.

title: Ethereum ‘smart’ whales open $426M long bets as ETH price chart eyes $4K
contentSnippet: ETH’s price rising to $3,000 drove whales to open 136,433 ETH long bets, as technical indicators suggest a short-term ETH price rally toward $4,000.

title: Coinbase mounts a cautious comeback in India, two years after exit
contentSnippet: Coinbase has reopened India app registrations, with local fiat on-ramps planned for 2026 following a rocky exit more than two years ago.

title: Canadian Province Wins Forfeiture of $1M QuadrigaCX Co-Founder's Cash, Gold via Default Judgment
contentSnippet: The ruling transfers cash, gold bars, watches, and jewelry seized from a CIBC safety deposit box and bank account into government hands after Patryn did not defend the case.

title: Farcaster Switches to Wallet-First Strategy to Grow Its Social App
contentSnippet: The protocol still consists of casts, follows, reactions, identities and wallets, and third-party clients are free to emphasize whichever components they want.

title: マクロン仏大統領、米仮想通貨規制緩和に警鐘　「金融不安定化のリスク」と指摘
contentSnippet: フランスのマクロン大統領が米国のステーブルコイン規制緩和について警告を発し、金融不安定化のリスクを指摘。欧州中央銀行に金融政策の見直しを求め、欧州の金融主権維持を主張。ステーブルコイン市場は3000億ドル超に急拡大。

title: 決済データDePINのSyFu、Finverseと提携しアジア5カ国のオープンバンキング展開へ
contentSnippet: 決済データ活用プロジェクトSyFuが、オープンバンキングプラットフォームFinverseと提携。香港、シンガポールなどアジア5カ国の約40金融機関と接続し、日常の支払いデータをトークンやNFTに変換できる仕組みを構築。欧州とアジアで世界規模のネットワークを確立。

title: Binance secures ADGM licenses to operate international platform
contentSnippet: Binance’s international operations and liquidity will now be supervised end-to-end by the Financial Services Regulatory Authority in the financial free zone in Abu Dhabi.

title: The future of secure messaging: Why decentralization matters more than ever
contentSnippet: Decentralized messengers shift security beyond encryption by reducing metadata, limiting data requests and preparing for post-quantum threats.

title: Coinbase Reopens India Signups, Targets Fiat On-Ramp in 2026 After Two-Year Freeze
contentSnippet: Coinbase halted services entirely in 2023, off-boarded millions of Indian users and shuttered local access while reassessing regulatory exposure.

title: トランプ大統領支援者所有の米Monet Bank、仮想通貨サービス事業に参入
contentSnippet: トランプ大統領支援者アンディ・ビール氏所有のモネ銀行が仮想通貨特化型金融サービスに参入する。トランプ政権下での規制緩和により、エレボール銀行やN3XTなど仮想通貨対応銀行が相次いで誕生する中、資産60億ドルの小規模地域銀行がデジタル資産の保管・融資を提供開始する。

title: Robinhood Eyes Indonesia Market as Local Crypto Adoption Soars
contentSnippet: Robinhood is buying a local brokerage and crypto firm as the country tightens digital finance rules and remains a leading crypto market.

title: トランプ政権の国家安全保障戦略、仮想通貨に言及せず　AI・量子技術を優先
contentSnippet: トランプ政権が発表した最新の国家安全保障戦略で仮想通貨への言及がゼロ。AI・量子技術を重視する一方、「仮想通貨大統領」を公言してきた経緯との整合性をめぐり議論が起きている。

title: Coinbase Reopens India Access, Sets 2026 Target for Cash-to-Crypto Purchases
contentSnippet: The move underscores Coinbase’s view of India as a long-term growth market, despite policy uncertainty in the near term.

title: Bitcoin Edges Back Above $91,000 as Traders Brace for Fed Decision and Jobs Data
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is edging higher ahead of the Fed’s final rate decision and a key jobs report, extending its rebound as thin liquidity persists.

title: FOMC控え不安定な展開続くビットコイン、前週末は大口の協調売りか
contentSnippet: 暗号資産（仮想通貨）市場ではビットコインが一時9万ドル割れで3.4億ドル規模の大量清算発生。クジラによる協調売りの可能性が浮上し、週末の薄い板で2000ドルの乱高下が見られた。一方でマイナー降伏を示すハッシュリボン反転で底打ちサインも。FOMC利下げ観測と円キャリー巻き戻しが市場を揺さぶる。

title: ZKsync to Retire Its Original Ethereum Rollup Next Year
contentSnippet: ZKsync is retiring its original Lite network, formalizing a shift toward ZKsync Era and the ZK Stack as activity on the legacy rollup fades.

title: ソラナDEX「ジュピター」の再担保に関する議論　「伝染リスクゼロ」主張を疑問視
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ソラナ基盤のジュピターが「伝染リスクゼロ」と主張したことについて、競合Kaminoなどが再担保の実施を指摘し批判した。ソラナ財団プレジデントは両者に協力を呼びかけている。

title: フランスの大手銀行BPCE、仮想通貨4銘柄の取引サービス開始
contentSnippet: フランスの大手銀行BPCEが約200万人の顧客向けに仮想通貨取引サービスを開始する。ビットコインなど4銘柄が銀行アプリで売買可能になる。

title: 韓国、取引所に無過失損害賠償責任を導入へ　アップビットのハッキング事件を受け
contentSnippet: 韓国金融当局が仮想通貨取引所に無過失損害賠償責任を導入へ。アップビットの445億ウォン不正アクセス事件を受け、2段階立法で規制強化。課徴金も売上高3%まで引き上げの方針。

title: Why Tokenized Assets Can't Flourish Without Liquidity: Securitize CEO
contentSnippet: Accessibility isn’t the only factor shaping a wave of tokenized assets, according to Securitize co-founder and CEO Carlos Domingo.

title: Getting Started With Myriad
contentSnippet: Myriad's prediction market ecosystem enables you to make predictions using USDC. Here’s how to get set up and start using it.

title: Buy the Bitcoin Dip? Why Ric Edelman Still Thinks Portfolios Should Hold Up to 40% Crypto
contentSnippet: Ric Edelman isn’t budging from the Bitcoin investment strategies he urged six months ago, even as BTC lingers far from record-breaking heights.

title: From Paper to Code: The Future of Tokenization with Carlos Domingo
contentSnippet: Securitize co-founder and CEO Carlos Domingo delves into the nuances of tokenization, from its potential benefits to the industry's failed experiments.

title: 「ビットコインを価値の橋渡し役に」Bitcoin Japan CEO、繊維業からの大転換とAI戦略を語る
contentSnippet: 東証上場の堀田丸正から「ビットコインジャパン」へ大胆に転換したフィリップ・ロード（Phillip Lord）CEOが、CoinPost独占インタビューでビットコイン準備金戦略とAIインフラ投資の詳細を明かした。「日本の品質×米国の規模」で2030年までに500MW規模のデータセンター投資を目指す。

title: ハイパーリキッドの将来性・HYPEの買い方｜注意点まで徹底解説
contentSnippet: HYPEトークンの買い方から注目理由まで完全解説。手数料収益による自動買い戻し、機関投資家参入、ステーキング機能など、急成長するDEX「Hyperliquid（ハイリキ）」の魅力を詳しく紹介します。

title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2025
contentSnippet: At a loss for what to buy the crypto fan in your life this festive season? Look no further than Decrypt’s holiday gift guide.

title: Professor Coin: When Bitcoin Sneezes—How Crypto and Equities Caught the Same Cold
contentSnippet: Academic literature finds that during periods of economic stress, correlations and spillovers between cryptocurrencies and equities spike.
